description.value:
You're no stranger to physical forms of comedy, and know how best to play up a tumble to elicit concerned gasps and relieved laughs from your audience and even yourself, manifesting this internal comedic logic to shield you from the worst of it. Whenever you use a desperate action Saving a Target to comically get in the way of the attack, you have resistance to the attack's damage.
    If the damage you suffer (after any reductions) equal or exceeds your character level, gain a @Compendium[undertaking-homebrew.abilities.ZVH8L715PTWTQLSE]{✨ Flair} point.

system.requirements: Must have the Bard Starter Abilities
